column2: "Yo! Partner!"
"Sorry to drag you out here, but I have no clue on how to explain..."
"You just gotta see this for yourself."
"... He got you involved too? Way to keep this private..."
"But, hey c'mon!"

"Oh, who do we have here, a guest?
You came out here because you
wanted to meet me, right?"
"Ah, you must be <%me>."
"Greetings, my name is Aurora. It's a pleasure to meet you."
"I bet that name doesn't mean much to you, does it?"
"Let's see, how could I explain myself so you'll understand..."
"I was the first host of [Apprentice], the Original Apprentice. Does that help?"
"Ouch, what was that for, you meanie!"
"Don't say things like \"The Original Apprentice,\" you can't even remember when you were [Apprentice]'s host."
"Like you can even talk, meanie, you were incomplete."
"You understand why I couldn't explain?"
"I was so confused. But not even Yuki-nee knew what even happened."
"And out from Yuki-nee, she popped out and introduces herself as \"Apprentice.\""
"Hey Afin, don't say \"popped out\" near me again. Just thinking about it again makes me..."
"How do you think I feel, meanie. If you weren't incomplete, I wouldn't be standing here looking like a child."
"Though, I guess this does realize my desire of preserving my youth, as odd as it is."
"Let's be clear on this. I have no idea on how or why I was brought back to life."
"All I know is, both myself and Yu-chan here, are linked due to our time as a host."
"I wish we weren't."
"Aww, don't be like that, you like this sudden turn of events."
"Digging into my memories doesn't help figure out why I'm alive now."
"So I ask of you, if you have any idea on what could have done this."
"I was part of [Apprentice] on day and now I'm here, looking like this. So I ask, why?"
"1. Perhaps the revival of the [Profound Darkness]?"
"2. Maybe the Corrupted Zone in Lillipa?"
"Wha? The [Profound Darkness] escaped, again?"
"Corrupted Zone? From the [Profound Darkness]?"
"What do you mean, again...?"
"Exactly what I've said, Yu-chan. I could say more, but that all depends if you can help me satisfy my curiosity."
"Give and take, right? Or is that a foreign concept to you people?"
"What are you..."
"Did you know people used to call me a \"Goddess\"?"
"And now, since I'm back, one way or another. I'd like to explore this planet."
"Who knows, Yu-chan. Maybe we can find a way to break this bond."
"...Hmph. I'll hold you accountable for this."
"Wait, Yuki-nee, we need to tell Xiao...!"
"Hey, Partner! Can you report this for us? Sorry to leave you with this."
"Hey, Yuki-nee. Wait up!"
